H Ismail) – (iKomidi yeNdlu yesiBethamthetho yezokuYokuBusa ngeHlanganyela neeNdaba zeNdabuko).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenlilo evela ezakhamuzini ze-Drobheni le-Letsitele, ku-Ward 23, e-Tzaneen, ebawa bona iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha iyaqinisekisa bona umasipala we-Tzaneen ulandela umthetho, nomthetho wabomasipala neembandela ebekiweko, begodu usebenzisa imilayo ebekiweko wezemvelo bewaba iindawo ngokufaneleko, begodu utjheje bewuphelise nazozoke izehlakalo ezingekho emthethweni (Mma D van der Walt) – (iKomidi yesiBethamthetho seNarha yokuBusa ngokuHlanganyela neeNdaba zeNdabuko).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).

H Ismail) – (iKomidi yesiBethamthetho seNarha yezokuBusa ngokuHlanganyela neeNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).).

eng: Petition from the residents of Kokomeng and neighbouring villages, calling on the Assembly to investigate and prioritize the re-opening of the Kokomeng police station (Mr I S Seitlholo) – (Portfolio Committee on Police – National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenLilo yezakhamuzi ze-Kokomeng nezabelo ezibomakhelwana bayo, ezenza ibizelo bona iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha yenze kube liqaloqangi ukuvulwa kabutjha kwesitetjhi samaPholisa i-Kokomeng (Nom. I S Seitlholo) – (iKomidi yesiBethamthetho seNarha yezesiPholisa – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Bredell, Pomona, Brentwood Park and Glen Marais (ward 25), City of Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the collapse of the reliable supply of electricity in their areas (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenlilo yezakhamuzi ze-Bredell, e-Pomona, e-Brentwood Park kunye ne-Glen Marais (iwadi 25), iDorobha le-Ekurhuleni, ezenza ibizelo bona iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha yenze iphenyo ngokuwohloka komthangalasisekelo wokuphakela igezi eendaweni zabo (Kkz. H Ismail) – (iKomidi yeNdlu yesiBethamthetho yezokuYokuBusa ngeHlanganyela neeNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Actonville, Benoni, calling on the Assembly to investigate the high rentals paid by tenants of council-owned flats (Ms H Ismail) – (Portfolio Committee on Human Settlements, Water and Sanitation – National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenlilo yezakhamuzi zendawo ye-Actonville, Benoni, eyenza ibizelo bona iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha iphenye mayelana nokubhadela okubiza khulu kwemali yokuqatjha ebhadelwa baqatjhi emafledeni abanikazi okumakhansela (Kkz. H Ismail) – (iKomidi yesiBethethamthetho seNarha yezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, Amanzi nokuThuthwa kweFucufucu – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Jamestown, Stellenbosch, calling on the Assembly to investigate the transfer, by Eskom, of management powers over the electricity network in Jamestown to Stellenbosch municipality (Dr L Shreiber) – (Portfolio Committee on Public Enterprises -  National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenlilo evela ezakhamuzini ze-Jamestown, e-Stellenbosch, ebawa bona iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha iphenye ngokudluliselwa kwamandla wokuphatha, yi-Eskom, bona kusasabalaliswa igezi e-Jamestown ngumasipala we-Stellenbosch (Dr L Shreiber) – (iKomidi yesiBethamthetho seNarha yamaBubulo womBuso – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Germiston, Ekurhuleni, calling on the Assembly to investigate power outages in Germiston (Ms M Clarke) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenlilo evela ezakhamuzini ze-Germiston, e-Ekurhuleni, ebawa iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha bona iphenye ngokuqima kwegezi e-Germiston (Mma M Clarke) – (iKomidi yesiBethamthetho seNarha yamaBubulo womBuso – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).

eng: Petition from the residents of Letsitele Town, Ward 23, Tzaneen, calling on the Assembly to ensure that the Tzaneen municipality abides by the laws, by-laws and regulations, and that it implements the prescribed environmental and applicable zoning, as well as monitor and halt all illegal activities (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs - National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenlilo evela ezakhamuzini ze-Drobheni le-Letsitele, ku-Ward 23, e-Tzaneen, ebawa bona iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha iyaqinisekisa bona umasipala we-Tzaneen ulandela umthetho, nomthetho wabomasipala neembandela ebekiweko, begodu usebenzisa imilayo ebekiweko wezemvelo bewaba iindawo ngokufaneleko, begodu utjheje bewuphelise nazozoke izehlakalo ezingekho emthethweni (Mma D van der Walt) – (iKomidi yesiBethamthetho seNarha yokuBusa ngokuHlanganyela neeNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).

eng: Petition from the farmers and the community of Tzaneen, Limpopo, represented by AGRI Letaba, calling on the Assembly to investigate severe electricity outages, power dips, low voltage and poor to no maintenance since 2016 as a result of the failure of the Greater Tzaneen Municipality (Ms D van der Walt) – (Portfolio Committee on Cooperative Governance and Traditional Affairs – National Assembly).
nbl: Incwadi yeenlilo evela kubosomaplasi nomphakathi we-Tzaneen, e-Limpopo, ezijanyelwe yi-AGRI Letaba, ebawa iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha bona iphenye ngokuqinywa kwegezi okwandileko, ngokwehliswa kwamadla wegezi, ukuphungula kwamandla womlilo nokubhalelwa kokuphathwa kwegezi ukusukela ngomnyaka ween-2016 ngonobangela wokubhalelwa koMasipala we-Greater Tzaneen (Mma D van der Walt) – (iKomidi yesiBethamthetho seNarha yezokuBusa ngokuHlanganyela neeNdaba zeNdabuko – iNdlu yesiBethamthetho seNarha).
